    • fireServerReconnectEvent

      public boolean fireServerReconnectEvent​(net.md_5.bungee.UserConnection user, net.md_5.bungee.ServerConnection server)
      Checks whether the current server should be ignored and fires a ServerReconnectEvent afterwards.
      Parameters:
      user - The User that should be reconnected.
      server - The Server the User should be reconnected to.
      Returns:
      true, if the ignore list does not contain the server and the event hasn't been canceled.

    • isUserOnline

      public boolean isUserOnline​(net.md_5.bungee.UserConnection user)
      Checks if a UserConnection is still online.
      Parameters:
      user - The User that should be checked.
      Returns:
      true, if the UserConnection is still online.

    • reconnectIfOnline

      public void reconnectIfOnline​(net.md_5.bungee.UserConnection user, net.md_5.bungee.ServerConnection server)
      Reconnects a User to a Server, as long as the user is currently online. If he isn't, his reconnect task (if he had one) will be canceled.
      Parameters:
      user - The User that should be reconnected.
      server - The Server the User should be connected to.

    • isReconnecting

      public boolean isReconnecting​(java.util.UUID uuid)
      Checks whether a User has got a reconnect task.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UniqueId of the User.
      Returns:
      true, if there is a task that tries to reconnect the User to a server.
